<fx:root alignment="TOP_RIGHT" maxHeight="1.7976931348623157E308" maxWidth="1.7976931348623157E308" prefWidth="400.0" spacing="10.0" type="javafx.scene.layout.HBox" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/18" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1">
<Label fx:id="dialog" prefHeight="89.0" prefWidth="242.0" style="-fx-background-color: #f0f0e6#f0f0e6; -fx-background-radius: 100; -fx-label-padding: 10;" text="Label" wrapText="true" />

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/18" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="duke.MainWindow">

<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutX="1.0" layoutY="558.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="321.0" promptText="hihihih" style="-fx-background-color: #e1e3e3#e1e3e3;" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0">

<Button fx:id="sendButton" blendMode="SRC_ATOP" layoutX="323.0" layoutY="558.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="76.0" style="-fx-background-color: #b1bab9#b1bab9;" text="Send">
<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" prefHeight="557.0" prefWidth="400.0" vvalue="1.0">
